title: OpenRC Transmitter
description: A little backstory: My name is Vitor, I'm a chemical engineer and got into electronics after seeing a led cube around 2011, since them I got the usual learning curve, arduinos, teensys, custom PCB boards, custom bootloaders, etc... I built my fair share of cool projects and robots, but something was always missing, a cool DIY controller. My first attempt to build a custom controller was this one: https://forum.pjrc.com/threads/29745-My-Teensy-Based-Robot-Controller [https://forum.pjrc.com/threads/29745-My-Teensy-Based-Robot-Controller]. It was based on a Teensy board, had a xbee board, and plenty channels, but it lacked design, good gimbals, and more wireless protocols. So this is my new attempt to make the ultimate RC Transmitter
